participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, enjoys creative pursuits.
participant_1.background: I couldn t live without my cell phone. I am more of a cat person than a dog person. I attend book club every week. My mom is my best friend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and sociable, loves engaging in conversations and exploring new interests.
participant_2.background: I work from home doing various jobs on the internet. I have a dog that has behavioral issues. I enjoy playing guitar and video games. I am in a very intimate and loving relationship. I love beef.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for work?
I work from home doing various jobs on the internet.
That sounds interesting. What kind of jobs?
I do a lot of writing, editing, and customer service.
Oh, cool. I love writing.
Do you write anything in particular?
I write a lot of different things, but mostly fiction.
That's awesome! I used to write a lot of fiction when I was younger, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
I'm sorry to hear that.
No, it's okay. I still love to read it, though.
Me too! I love reading all kinds of genres, but I'm especially fond of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love the way those genres can take you on an adventure and make you think about things in a different way.
I agree! They're so much fun to read.
Do you have any favorite books?
I have so many, but I'll name a few. I love the Harry Potter series, the Lord of the Rings series, and the Ender's Game series.
Those are all great books! I love them too.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Percy Jackson series, the Hunger Games series, and the Divergent series.
Those are all great books too! I've read them all.
Me too! I love how they all have such strong female characters.
Me too! They're so inspiring.
Do you have any other hobbies besides writing?
I love to play video games and guitar.
Me too! I love to play video games, but I'm not very good at guitar.
That's okay! I'm not very good at guitar either, but I have a lot of fun playing it.
Me too! It's so relaxing.
I agree! It's a great way to relieve stress.
It is! I love playing guitar when I'm feeling stressed.
Me too! It's the best.
